channel.title: My Portfolio on Heba Moh.
channel.description: Recent content in My Portfolio on Heba Moh.

item.title: Pure Python vs NumPy vs Sklearn Performance Comparison
item.description: How much faster does the application run when implemented with NumPy instead of pure Python? What about TensorFlow?

item.title: Airport Agenda using Dijkstra's algorithm
item.description: Implementation of Dijkstra’s algorithm from scratch for return the shortest path from source airport to destenation based on user inputs

item.title: Hotel Bookings Cancellation Classification
item.description: In tourism and travel-related industries, most of the research on Revenue Management demand forecasting and prediction problems employ data from the aviation industry, in the format known as the Passenger Name Record (PNR). This is a format developed by the aviation industry.

item.title: Computer Repair shop Database
item.description: Creating database for Computer Repair shop Database using MySQL DBMS

item.title: Median Housing Price Prediction
item.description: In a Machine Learning Housing Corporation! The first task you are asked to perform is to build a model of housing prices in California using the California census data.

item.title: Bangalore House Price Prediction
item.description: A study approach that utilizes a variety of methods (Logistic Regression, K-Folds, and DNN) to predict the houses price

item.title: Melanoma Classification
item.description: A classification model for classifying the images to Melanoma or not motivated by the performance of Convolutional Neural Networks in computer vision, I present a CNN-based model from scratch.

item.title: Smart Rehabilitation
item.description: An AI company which builds and sells AI software to different types of clients using GA-Based Solution for Optimal Exercise Plans.

item.title: Web Scraping Job Postings from Indeed
item.description: Through scraping Indeed, an organization can establish a competitive salary, gain understanding of employee sentiment and values, find great candidates, and build a realistic budget for hiring employees and outside contractors.

item.title: University Accommodation Office Database
item.description: Collection and analysis phase of the database design process for University Accommodation Office

item.title: WERateDogs Data Wrangling
item.description: Wrangling the tweet archive of Twitter user @dog_rates, also known as WeRateDogs.

item.title: About
item.description: It is Heba Mohamed from Egypt graduated from the Computer and Communication department of the Benha Faculty of Engineering in July 2021. I’m highly interested in data science, particularly machine learning; I began studying it in September 2020 with the HCIA-AI course, which sparked my curiosity in continuing my education in this sector. After that, I decided that my graduation project would have to be an AI application which push me to learn more and more in this field.

item.title: Bike Sharing Systems
item.description: Bike sharing systems are new generation of traditional bike rentals where whole process from membership, rental and return back has become automatic. Through these systems, user is able to easily rent a bike from a particular position and return back at another position.

item.title: BikeSharing Exploration
item.description: Using Python to explore data related to bike share systems for three major cities in the United Statesâ€”Chicago, New York City, and Washington.

item.title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow, 2nd Edition
item.description: Trying to summarize each book I read in a notebook in order to facilitate revision and search procedures regarding a given topic; also, these conclusions contain additional information from different resources such as articles, YouTube, etc.
